learn how to monitor and manage ckd effe: Koyi yadda za ka lura da kuma kula da CKD cikin inganci. Lafiyar ka ita ce fifikon mu.
Learn the steps you can take to reduce t: Koyi matakan da za ka ɗauka don rage haɗarin CKD, ciki har da rayuwar lafiya, shan ruwa sosai, da kuma duba lafiyar ka akai-akai.
Get tools and insights to track kidney h: Samun kayan aiki da bayanai don lura da lafiyar koda, nazarin alamomi, da kuma kula da jin dadin ka.
Access detailed information about treatm: Samun cikakkun bayanai game da shirye-shiryen magani, gyare-gyaren rayuwa, da kuma jagorancin masana don dacewa da bukatun ka.
